thread.title: Reuters TV Special: The Trump Effect on Davos

title: Reuters TV Special: The Trump Effect on Davos
text:
Reuters TV Special: The Trump Effect on Davos 5:12am IST - 18:21 
DAVOS, SWITZERLAND - U.S. President Donald Trump told the crowd in Davos that America is open for business. We’re live in Davos with analysis of his speech, which ranged in topic from the economy to trade and terrorism. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
DAVOS, SWITZERLAND - U.S. President Donald Trump told the crowd in Davos that America is open for business. We’re live in Davos with analysis of his speech, which ranged in topic from the economy to trade and terrorism. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://in.reuters.com/video/2018/02/01/reuters-tv-special-the-trump-effect-on-d?videoId=388875613&videoChannel=13423
